pages.title: Filter Base
pages.text: This can filter for items, regardless of nbt or additional data it contains.

pages.title: Example(s)
pages.text: There isnt a whole lot to this filter, it does 1 job, very well. $(li)Lets say we have a witch farm, since we can get a variety of potions from them it would be handy to be able to filter out all potions, Using this filter you could set a water bottle in the filter, and the filter would now be able to filter for all manner of vanilla style potions.
